title: A song of Patriotic Prejudice
content:
I tried to get the Dubya Bush patriotisim that seems to be so popular these days, no matter what nationality you are.


A song of Patriotic Prejudice

NZer's, NZer's NZer's are best,
I wouldn't give squat for all of the rest.

The lousiest lands of this planet of ours,
We've left occupied by three unfriendly powers.
Examine Australia, Britian, US,
You'll find they're all stinkers and often much less.

The British are bastards, we're all well aware,
they invade other countries and kill all those there.
They speak with weird accents, where it rains all the day,
And they have Only Blair to show them the way.

NZer's, NZer's NZer's are best,
I wouldn't give squat for all of the rest.

Americians now, when shove comes to push,
They're even worse, they're governed by Bush!
They're lazy and fat 'cause they never toil,
And they spend all day out hunting for oil.

NZer's, are loyal, and noble and nice,
And better than any you'll see in a trice.

The Aussies are a$$holes, down to a man,
They'll boast and they'll swear just as much as they can.
They're all filled with malice and anger and hate,
Because NZ sportsmen are always so great.

NZer's are honest and lovely and good,
And humble and and sweet and misunderstood.

Even in the Keen forum you cannot say much,
Grandy is German, Djaser is Dutch.
Rories an Ocker, Xky's Russian and red,
And Fleex and Ilsoap are both screwed in the head.

NZer's are moral and clever as well,
And never offensive, though tempted like hell.

And all the world over each nations the same,
All filled with extremists, and they're all insane.
They blow up churches and mosques, so I've heard,
For a kind loving God, now that is absurd!

NZer's, NZer's, NZer's, are best,
So lets hear it for us and bugger the rest.

It's not that they're evil, disgusting or bad,
Its knowing they're not us that makes them all mad.
For NZ is all that a nation should be,
And the icons of NZ are Androo and me.

A proud member of the signature stealing society

[img]http://img.photobucket.com/albums/v410/Gannalev/Kazz.gif[/img]

"No one should be here."
-Levellord

title: Re: A song of Patriotic Prejudice
content:

And humble and and sweet and misunderstood."

content:
